doc.name: printRectangle
doc.summary: Reports the printable region of the page.

examples.example: set the rect of group "Print output" to the printRectangle

description.p: Use the printRectangle property to determine the printable region of the physical page as returned by the printer. This rectangle will always be contained within the printPaperRectangle.
The printRectangle is a comma-separated list of integers in the form left,top,right,bottom. The integers are in points and are relative to the top-left of the page.
The printRectangle property is read-only and cannot be set.
